website_summaries.verdict: DVR aficionados who want to record lots of memory-intensive 4K or HD content may want to look into this powerhouse.
pros: Records up to 450 hours of HD content and up to six shows simultaneously
Easy installation and setup takes about an hour, including cable setup

customer_reviews.title: Although I miss the substantial chassis of the Roamio Pro ...
customer_reviews.text: Although I miss the substantial chassis of the Roamio Pro, the Bolt Vox contains all the brains and brawn and then some. Set up was a breeze, and even the transition to the new Hydra experience has gone smoothly (though not glitch-less). I do miss the old interface, but I do see some strong advantages to the new one. The voice feature I thought was going to be another IoT me-too gimmick. It's not. I find myself using the voice on this more often that typing in a channel, or setting up a OnePass.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P. Walters

customer_reviews.title: This is how TV should be
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this device? I just love it! Pros: - Good-looking, easy to use interface - OnePass options cover everything you need - Skip button! The greatest invention in TV since color! - Voice search that actually works. And gives results for streaming options as well as from the guide - Apps for many of my favorite streaming options (HBO, Amazon Prime, YouTube) - App to stream movies from your PC (Plex). This is huge for me as I have a large movie collection. Cons: - Setup can be tough depending on your cable service provider - Amazon Alexa integration is iffy. Sometimes works, sometimes doesn't - Could use some more apps
customer_reviews.author: P. Mancini

customer_reviews.title: Solid upgrade from Roameo
customer_reviews.text: Got a new Bolt to replace my older Roameo. The box is much smaller and also much faster which is great. The box was easy to set up. Same install process as before. Comcast was able to get the box registered and card synced in under 10 minutes. I have a bunch of TiVo mini’s so setting up the MoCA net and getting them connected was easy. Had to upgrade them to the Bolt UI before I could use them... no choice to stay on the older UI...
customer_reviews.author: Heidiv

customer_reviews.title: Fourth and last TiVo platform – TiVo gets worse with each new release
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 complete TiVo platforms with the last one being the Tivo Bolt. The equipment gets more unreliable with each release and software provides fewer useful features. I certainly cannot recommend this hardware. I currently have one Bolt and 2 Minis. TiVo fully participates in the larger conspiracy with Comcast and the FCC to restrict viewer freedom and create monopolies.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Tried two...both defective
customer_reviews.text: Had a TiVo Bolt 500MB for a month -- loved it, but wanted to upgrade to the 3TB for extra tuners. Received the first 3TB and set the 500 aside. After walking through setup and installing the Cable Card, it wouldn't even fully boot up before rebooting itself. I tried it for about a day before returning for a replacement. The second went better in that it at least got to TV channels, then worked for a few minutes before...like the first...constantly rebooted itself. There seems to be a heat or power problem with the 3TB model as both ran hotter than the 500MB.
customer_reviews.author: David Yeoman

customer_reviews.title: Love TiVo
customer_reviews.text: We replaced a Roamio Pro with this Bolt. Have used TiVo for years and prefer it to the cable company's DVR. After a few years of not paying the rental fee for their box and remote we end up saving money and we're able to sell the old box to recoup even more. Plus the ability to download non-DRM shows to your device or stream them remotely is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: robanks

customer_reviews.title: Tivo Does it again!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from an old Bolt (that I broke by trying to upgrade the hard drive myself!). Love the added storage and the voice remote feature, makes finding things a breeze. I'm not sure how I feel about the updated interface at this time, I miss the old TIVO look but functionality wise, it's top notch. So far so good! Will upgrade my Tivo Minis to the VOX versions soon!
customer_reviews.author: Omar Castro

customer_reviews.title: New Tivo's are great, but no HBOGO if you are Comcast/Xfinity
customer_reviews.text: New Tivo streaming options are great, much faster than old models. New interface is nice and voice controls work perfectly. If you are Comcast / Xfinity the HBOGO option will not work, Comcast are @$#holes and block HBOGO from Tivo even if you pay for HBO in your package. Not a deal breaker but still stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Scantron

customer_reviews.title: Miss nothing, see & store all your favs!
customer_reviews.text: Our first TiVo and after three months a Homerun! It works and we saved $8.00 a month off our cable bill as we no longer needed the cable box and traded the box for a $2.00 a month card.
customer_reviews.author: P D'beta

customer_reviews.title: Hard drives fail every month.  What a piece of garbage!
customer_reviews.text: I've had it about 3 months and I'm already on my second replacement. The hard drives in these things fail if you look at them crooked. For $500 you'd think they would put in a decent drive.
customer_reviews.author: Kev840

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: TiVo is the best. However, first unit died after a couple of weeks...and had to get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Lon V.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: We have this for a couple of months. I am so glad we took the plunge and bought it. We can Record 6 shows at once and love the microphone to locate shows. Also it will record shows it thinks we might like!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Possibly stolen
customer_reviews.text: This is the third TiVo I have received in a week. Again, I cannot activate, apparently this belongs to someone else. Not sure if Amazon is buying stolen prodcudts or TiVo is refusing to activate because it is purchased through Amazon. Returning again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Heist

customer_reviews.title: Tivo is still the best DVR on the market!!
customer_reviews.text: Setup and activation was quite easy. The TiVo UI is still the best in the business (by far). The voice commands work without issue. The unified search capabilities continue to make the TiVo DVR stand well above the rest. The only problems that I had on the setup were on the cable company side due to the fact that Comcast did not properly activate my Cable Card. Once I got past that, it's been clear sailing and great tv viewing. TiVo continues to be the best!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. stay away.
customer_reviews.text: Hard drive burned out in a year and a half. stay away
customer_reviews.author: lighthouse digital

customer_reviews.title: Delighted!
customer_reviews.text: Great capacity. Delightful navigation. Easy setup. Insertion of a cable card (just $2/mo) was a breeze. This TiVo allowed me to drop my two DVR boxes and related cable costs saving me $50/mo. I could not be happier, and I'm a 68 year old man with limited patience for technology set ups.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive, but great item.
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Especially the voice assist. 3rd Tivo we've owned.
customer_reviews.author: JerryJ

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy - Audio on remote is inoperable - A known problem.
customer_reviews.text: The audio feature on the remote does not work at all. When I try to pair the audio with the TIVO unit it gives me an error message with an error code number. The technicians I talked to tell me it a known problem and that they are working on it. Meanwhile, it has been 3 weeks since I ordered it and nothing. I am getting very skeptical that it may never work. The amazing things promised with the sound input on the remote was one of the major reason I bought the unit - very disappointing. If they finally get it working I may change my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Springer

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy them stay with cable company boxes
customer_reviews.text: The boxes dont record shows and have to reboot them all the time they make a noise all the time like a loud humming noise and you have to pay for monthly service of $15 for each box and you have to do all the trouble shooting. Just not worth it more trouble than they are worth.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.B

customer_reviews.title: Best DVR ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had the older version of TiVo and this is a winner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Tivo Great, but beware ordering from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Bought a brand new Bolt from Amazon and couldn't set it up because it was already registered to someone else. Tivo wouldn't register it and Amazon couldn't explain anything. I assume it was originally a Tivo shipment that was stolen. Their machines are registered at the factory. So, Amazon is sending a replacement(hopefully new!), but it's been 2 hours of frustration and missed recordings tonight.
customer_reviews.author: rbs

customer_reviews.title: When attempting to activate this Tivo, the Tivo support ...
customer_reviews.text: When attempting to activate this Tivo, the Tivo support team is telling me that it has already been activated and is registered to another user. I am not able to use it. They are instructing me to contact the current person it's registered to and have them unregister it. Ridiculous and unacceptable!! Returned to Amazon for a replacement. Hopefully that works.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moroch

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: doesn't work when transferring from Bolt to Bolt Vox 3T
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... User Manual - have to contact TiVo - very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: No User Manual - have to contact TiVo - very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Linda  Boucke

customer_reviews.title: This is a SCAM
customer_reviews.text: This is a scam by TiVo. This box is useless unless you buy one of their plans. There is no way to activate the 400 dollar box unless you pay more for their service. The product description does not mention this.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Wont last
customer_reviews.text: Had mine for about a year, hard drive quit. Replacement gives error on guided setup and wont activate. Tivo's solution, leave it unplugged for two days and try again. Don't waste your time. Get a Premier or Roamio. Bolts are small, poor airflow, and crappy Toshiba 3tb hard drive that itself gets 2 star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: DaveNLR

customer_reviews.title: ... my aging Tivo Premiere XL and could not be happier! The Bolt Vox offers outstanding performance and is ...
customer_reviews.text: I finally decided to upgrade from my aging Tivo Premiere XL and could not be happier! The Bolt Vox offers outstanding performance and is fully featured. The voice control works perfectly. I decided to wire the Vox directly from my cable provider to my new Sony Bravia X900F, bypassing my Pioneer Elite receiver. The picture quality is superb! I added a Sony Sound Bar and I am one happy camper. NOTE: Despite what other reviews may say, if you have Verizon Fios, you will still be required to obtain an M-type cable card from Verizon to connect to the cable system. Some people have said that TIVO has eliminated this long-standing need, but that isn't true.
customer_reviews.author: rgj21

customer_reviews.title: Faulty equipment
customer_reviews.text: We loved ours till it Erased 2 tb worth of data and started rebooting every 40 min. Tivo won’t stand by there product for more then 3 months so we have to pay to have it fixed and won’t have tv for several weeks while we send it back. Tivo needs to get their act together, a $500 box should last more than 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: w

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This product is a disaster! I had a minor black out during a rainstorm and it fried my hard drive. I lost all my shows. I spent a huge amount of money so I could save lots of shows and then I lost it all.
customer_reviews.author: Bobio

customer_reviews.title: Best DVR on the market
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from a DirectTV Genie. This unit is so much better than the Genie, I dropped DirectTV all together. Great interface. The voice controlled remote works GREAT. Love this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: TiVo BOLT VOX 3TB, DVR & Streaming Media Player, 4K UHD, Now with Voice Control! (TCD849300V)
product_meta.description: TiVo’s innovative Unified Entertainment System now includes the ultimate voice remote that dramatically improves the search experience across all your live TV, DVR and streaming TV series and movies. The 4K Ultra HD compatible TiVo BOLT VOX still boasts TiVo’s unique fan-favorite features including SkipMode, OnePass, OneSearch and more. And with three different models, there’s a BOLT VOX specifically crafted to meet your entertainment demands and budget. HDMI 2.0
feature_bullets: TiVo’s new Voice Remote lets you instantly search across your live TV, DVR recordings and streaming content to quickly and easily find what you’re looking for.
This unified entertainment system replaces your cable box and works with your existing cable subscription (requires Cable Card).
Your favorite streaming apps are fully Integrated: no more switching inputs, remotes or devices. Access Netflix, Prime, HBO go, Hulu, Pandora and more from one, Integrated experience.
Watch eye-popping 4K/UHD content. Fully 4K/Ultra High-Definition compatible right out of the box, so you can soak up all that crisp color, clarity and detail.
TiVo service subscription is required. Options include a monthly service plan at $14.99/mo. and a 1-Year commitment,(4) and an Annual service plan at $149.99/year.

Record 6 shows at once and up to 450 hours of HD. Compatibility-Works with TiVo Mini and TiVo Mini VOX. Connects to other TiVo DVRs. iOS and Android app for mobile viewing and management. Expandable storage (eSATA)
NOTE: Refer the User Manual before use. Power : 12 V

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars67 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
